home.title: Welcome, Whistle Blower Application
home.welcome: Welcome to the Benjamin William Mkapa Foundation secured Whistle Blower system where you can leave a confidential message for the management to take appropriate action. BMF is aware / alert that occasionally there may be improprieties of financial or other nature. BMF takes such possible impropriates very serious and has zero tolerance among the BMF staff and other stakeholders. Please feel free to report your concern and be assured that the reported information is managed with highest confidentiality.
